BBK01.WU5012: Exchange rates on the Frankfurt exchange / FRF 100 = DM ... / from January 1960 / France

General: Average calculated from daily quotations. Official quotation for NF and FF from the start of 1960 to the end of 1998. (Previously, between 4 May 1953 and 31 December 1959 quotation for ffrs); see wu5011. Currency conversion with effect from 1 January 1960: ffrs 100 = NF 1 (french New Franc); Currency renamed as of 1 January 1963: FF. From 1 January 1999, irrevocable euro conversion rate: Euro 1 = FRF 6.55957
